summary.para: Performs the softsign function on every element in InputTensor, placing the result into the corresponding element of OutputTensor.
Where abs(x) returns the absolute value of x.
This operator supports in-place execution, meaning that the output tensor is permitted to alias InputTensor during binding.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_SOFTSIGN_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: The input tensor to read from.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_SOFTSIGN_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The output tensor to write the results to.
